title: Doing 'Umrah in Ramadan for my dead father, will he get reward of Hajj?
transcript: he says that if someone makes a om in Ramadan it is like making Haj with the prophet Alam it's not like making with the prophet if you make omah now it is as if you're making ha with the prophet so if he he says if I'm doing it on behalf of my dead father would my father get the same reward of Hajj with the prophet the answer is yes would I get something you will not get anything except inshallah some reward because the was entirely devoted to someone who's deceased so he gets all uh the AER
